price: 71. (Lot) respondió: «Ahí tenéis a mis hijas[441] (para que os caséis con ellas) si queréis hacerlo».
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: [441]  Ver la nota de la aleya 78 de la sura 11.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
